findings.title: removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee on transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee on transfer tokens in swap function.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee on transfer tokens

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as External and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability through sync
findings.description: The usage of 'sync' can lead to reentrancy vulnerabilities if not properly handled.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.
